src:
Publix Chicken Tender Subs on sale for $6.99 starting Thursday
06 Nov 2019, 16:42 by WFTX Digital Team



Brace yourselves folks, because the popular Publix Chicken Tender Sub is on sale starting Thursday!
According to the store's weekly ad, a whole Chicken Tender Sub will cost $6.99, a savings of $2.
The deal starts on Thursday, Nov. 7 and runs through next Wednesday, Nov. 13.

RELATED: Publix debuts stylish new swag < /span>

In addition, Publix is offering a buy one, get one free deal on its Pulled Pork Sandwich.
Get the party started by placing an online order by clicking here.
